comments.body: Hello everyone,As promised, we negotiated an exclusive bonus for our readers, and you can find it here - https://paynplay-casinos.com/exclusive-casino-offers/#Limited-Time_No_Deposit_Casino_Bonus_Code_Available_Right_NowIt's not too much, but it's a solid deal, so you can try out this new online casino. It's VPN friendly, crypto friendly, so we think you'll like it.We're working on another one, will post it here as soon as we confirm it!We're a small team, so we update things as we go and when we see cool things worth sharing.Let us try and answer some of the points you brought up without replying to everyone individually.- Yes, many of the casinos aren't that famous or well-known. But what's the point of us recommending sites that you all know? No promotions are paid, we list casinos that we like and that we think aren't too famous because everyone knows the famous ones. We do take commissions like all other affiliate business models but don't sell places on ranking tables or anything. We test the sites and then rank them as we believe they deserve to be ranked.- We try to negotiate exclusive deals and list them on the page linked above. Those get the best value for our readers because standard bonuses can be found anywhere.- There are many affiliate sites, as you know, and some of them are similar to ours, that's impossible to avoid. But we like online casinos, we like casino games, and creative methods of adding money and cashing out. There is so much fake and false info there, so we try to keep objective in the sense that we give you the facts, and you can decide whether you want to play. We're not saying you will win because you may not win; that's how gambling works. And many of the readers here are aware of that, but also there are many new players who believe things they read without double-checking.- Pay N Play is a payment feature created by Trustly, it's used in Scandinavian countries. It's an awesome feature that lets users deposit and immediately have an account through BankID without completing registration. BankID would do the registration and account verification in the background, so players wouldn't have to complete all those steps and waste time. We really think it's an awesome concept and that's why it was the main focus of our website. However, Pay N Play is available in only a few countries, and many of our visitors couldn't use it at all, so we decided to expand with alternative payment methods we think are worth your attention. When we added crypto casinos, we believed it would be useful for us and for you here to check our website and see what we have.The theme is obviously popular and one we'll keep using for the time being. Thanks for your feedback on it, any changes and improvements take a lot of time and resources. We don't always have either or both, but we really appreciate any feedback, even when it's negative. We'll see what can be done about the night mode.- Regarding the categories, in our opinion, the best casino overall may not be the best live dealer casino or the best mobile casino. Also, not all of the brands we recommend have the same payment methods, so the best casino with Trustly may not have AstroPay, and that's why we need separate pages for separate points of interest. Of course, you can open the best casino and see what it offers, but someone may search for a specific phrase, and they will land on that specific page and get that relevant information. That's how our team sees it; it's possible to be wrong, but for now, it's easy for us to organize what we've published so far in the way we have it. It can be reconsidered, but the results so far have been promising.Thank you all for your comments and feedback once again. Reading everything and responding while working on the site and having other activities in life isn't easy. We're slow sometimes (sometimes it takes us 2 years  ), but we always work to add cool info and cool casinos that you may not have tried. We're going to conferences, seeing the trends, reading news, so we're invested in this to give value to our readers.We're creating a VPN casinos page next and a CoinsPaid page also.Stay good, stay healthy, and stay lucky!
